## Code points requiring contextual rules
Code point Description of rule/Reference
U+002D Label must neither start nor end with U+002D. Label HYPHEN-MINUS must not have U+002D in both third and fourth position. RFC 5891 (sec 4.2.3.1)

rule.comment: RFC5891 restrictions on placement of U+002D
